data.comment: The match is underway in Utrecht.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a first substitution, with David Neres replacing Antony Santos.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Davy Klaassen.
In the minute 62, Great play from Zakaria Labyad to set up the goal.
Dusan Tadic (Ajax) has received a yellow card from Bjorn Kuipers.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Sander Van de Streek replacing Eljero Elia.
In the minute 71, An attacking Ajax player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Dusan Tadic nets and Ajax extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Othman Boussaid is replacing Joris Overeem for the home team.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Mimoun Mahi with Moussa Sylla. This is the third substitution made today by Rene Hake.
Quincy Promes is replacing Zakaria Labyad for Ajax at Stadion Galgenwaard.
The away team replace Lassina Franck Traore with Edson Alvarez.
In the minute 81, Adrian Dalmau is on a sub for Justin Hoogma for Utrecht.
Sean Klaiber is replacing Noussair Mazraoui for the away team.
Bjorn Kuipers blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
Ajax take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Quincy Promes.
